heif.boxes

Class ItemLocationBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • heif.boxes.Box
      • heif.boxes.FullBox
        • heif.boxes.ItemLocationBox

  • public class ItemLocationBox
extends FullBox
    The ItemLocationBox class handles the HEIF Box identified as iloc (Item Location Box).

    This box provides a directory of item resources, either in the same file or in external files. Each entry describes the item's container, offset within that container, and length.

    For technical details, refer to the specification document: ISO/IEC 14496-12:2015, pages 77â€“80.

    API Note: Additional testing is required to validate the reliability and robustness of this implementation.

    Since:
    13 August 2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

      • ItemLocationBox

        public ItemLocationBox(Box box,
                       SequentialByteReader reader)
        Constructs an ItemLocationBox by parsing the provided iloc box data.
        Parameters:
        box - the parent Box containing common box values
        reader - a SequentialByteReader for sequential access to the box content
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if external data references (dataReferenceIndex != 0) are found

    • Method Detail

      • findItem

        public ItemLocationBox.ItemLocationEntry findItem(int itemID)
        Finds the item with the specified itemID.
        Parameters:
        itemID - the item identifier to search for
        Returns:
        the matching ItemLocationEntry, or null if not found

      • findExtentsForItem

        public java.util.List<ItemLocationBox.ExtentData> findExtentsForItem(int itemID)
        Finds all extents associated with the specified itemID.
        Parameters:
        itemID - the item identifier to search for
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable list of extents for the item, or empty list if none found

      • getItems

        public java.util.List<ItemLocationBox.ItemLocationEntry> getItems()
        Returns the list of all items.
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable list of items

      • logBoxInfo

        public void logBoxInfo()
        Logs a single diagnostic line for this box at the debug level.

        This is useful when traversing the box tree of a HEIF/ISO-BMFF structure for debugging or inspection purposes.

        Overrides:
        logBoxInfo in class FullBox

      • readSizedValue

        private long readSizedValue(int input,
                            SequentialByteReader reader)
        Reads a value from the stream based on the specified size indicator.
        • 0 â€“ value is always zero (no bytes read)
        • 4 â€“ reads a 4-byte unsigned integer
        • 8 â€“ reads an 8-byte unsigned integer
        Parameters:
        input - the number of bytes to read: {0, 4, 8}
        reader - a SequentialByteReader for reading the value
        Returns:
        the parsed value as an unsigned long
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if input is not one of {0, 4, 8}

      • isVersion1or2

        private boolean isVersion1or2()
        Checks whether this box uses version 1 or version 2 of the ItemLocationBox format.
        Returns:
        true if the box version is 1 or 2, otherwise false
